resources.string: Press Menu for call options, Call button to put on hold, or Back to hang up.
Press Menu to answer or Back to reject call.

Sipdroid is an open-source SIP client for Android 
 
See http://sipdroid.org for more info 
 
Version ${VERSION} 
The software has been released for beta testing.

Please enter called party address as name@domain.com
Check with your mobile operator if he allows VoIP
Dials all of one person\'s phone numbers in parallel
Displays your position on web page
If no suitable data network available
Set ringtone for incoming SIP call
